message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE. 

This paper deals with the task of summarizing interleaved texts, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with summarizing multiple conversations or topic threads. The use of an encoder-decoder network and attention mechanism suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the use of a hierarchical framework suggests the involvement of neural networks (cs.NE).
